alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 18 at 1:29PM MDT until April 18 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph shifting northwest through the afternoon and remaining very strong. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Northern Wasatch Front, Salt Lake Valley, Utah Valley, Western Millard and Juab Counties and Eastern Juab/Millard Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult due to crosswinds, especially for high profile vehicles and vehicles with trailers.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
